quote: Learning curves are an important source of information for making decisions on the following matters in machine learning: Data Acquisition, Early Stopping of training a model, and Early Discarding in model selection.
Learning curves describe a system’s performance on a task as a function of some resource to solve that task.

Our contribution is a unified framework of the usage of learning curves for decision making in machine learning and an extensive review of the literature of approaches that fall within this framework.
